channel.title: Qgis on Stencilled

item.title: Breweries or Wineries ??
item.description: When you think about Texas, the first thing that would come in mind is barbecue which of course pairs well with a good beer. In this post I have mapped each state in the US ranked based on the breweries or wineries present. I got the data from the Brewers Association and the American Winery Guide. With data visualization being so important in representing the dataset I have used hexbins shapefile from Don Meltz’s repo.
